module.name: Dictation
module.changelog: *1.1.1* Fix for Dictation not appearing on User page when in Device and User mode. *1.1* Fix changes not sticking when creating an extension, replace Rob-sounds with Allison-sounds. *1.0.1* Replaced 'invalid extension' with 'feature not available on this line' when disabled *1.0.0* Original Release
module.description: This uses the app_dictate module of Asterisk to let users record dictate into their phones. When complete, the dictations can be emailed to an email address specified in the extension page.
